p: The remaining 285 ACE2 orthologs are summarized in Supplementary Table S3, including 134 mammals (Mammalia), 57 birds (Aves), 69 fish (Actinopterygii (66), Chondrichthyes (2), and Sarcopterygii (1)), 20 reptiles (Reptilia), and 5 amphibians (Amphibia). The protein ID, scientific classification (Class and Species), and common name are provided for easy retrieval.
